title: aDiyAr kaDaittEra
sahitya:
aDiyAr kaDaittEra ArupaDai vIDugaLil kuDiyErit-tiru kATSi koDukkinrAn kumaran


anupallavi

  kaDaikkaN aruLAl tan aDi tozhudiDuvOrin iDarellAm ODi viDum inba sukham UTTugirAn


caraNam    paDi idanilE tannai aDaikkalam enraDaiyum aDiyArgaLait-tollai aNugAmal taDuttu
iDai viDAdavakku koDai aLLik-koDuttu iNai vEru illAda tuNaivanAi aNaittu
